about_the_game:
Pick up the Collector's Edition of the game!

This DLC was created by popular request & does not add any new content to the game

Thank you so much for supporting me & my game development! Deep Space was an absolutely fun project to work on. It took a lot of hard work & sleepless nights but at the end of the day, I'm proud of how it turned out. It may have not gotten the best reviews or sales, but it was my first game on Steam and I'll always treasure it, and now you can too.

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence or Gore, General Mature Content

name: Deep Space Classic - Collector's Edition

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy Deep Space Classic - Collector's Edition

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1+
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 3GB memory
  • DirectX: Version 10
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 3GB memory
  • DirectX: Version 10
